infotext.missiondescription.abandonedoutposthusks: Contact with [location1] was recently lost, and it's suspected that the husk infection has taken over. Locate any infected creatures or eggs inside the outpost and destroy them.
infotext.missionsuccess.abandonedoutposthusks: The infection inside the outpost has been successfully eradicated.
infotext.missionmessage0.abandonedoutposthusks: The infection inside the outpost has been successfully eradicated. Undock from the outpost to complete the mission.
infotext.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostsepge: Contact with [location1] was recently lost, and there have been reports that seperatists have been using this location as a headquarters. Destroy the outpost's reactor to clear out any seperatist forces hiding at the location.
infotext.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostsepgen: The general has been successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionfailure.abandonedoutpostsepgen: Eliminating the leader of the seperatist failed.
infotext.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostsepgen: The seperatist general has been successfully eliminated. Undock from the outpost to complete the mission.
infotext.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostsepge: Contact with [location1] was recently lost, and there have been reports about a notorious seperatist general using this location as a headquarters. This individual has a small army defending them and a massive stockpile of weapons at their disposal, tread lightly. There's a massive bounty on the head of the General â€“ eliminate them to claim the reward.
infotext.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostsepgen: The general has been successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionfailure.abandonedoutpostsepgen: Eliminating the leader of the seperatist failed.
infotext.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostsepgen: The seperatist general has been successfully eliminated. Undock from the outpost to complete the mission.
infotext.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostsepre: Contact with [location1] was recently lost, and seperatist recently sent out a message in which they demand a ransom for releasing a group of civilians they're holding hostage. The Coalition doesn't negotiate with terrorists, but has promised a considerable reward to anyone who manages to rescue the hostages. Be warned, these individuals are well-armed and battle-trained, be prepared!
infotext.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostseprescu: The hostages are now all safely on board the sub. Undock from the outpost to complete the mission.
infotext.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostsepsq: Contact with [location1] was recently lost, and it's suspected that the seperatist are responsible. Wipe out their forces, but be warned, these individuals are well-armed and battle-trained, be prepared.
infotext.missionfailure.abandonedoutpostsepsquad: Seperatist forces remain in control of the outpost
infotext.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostsepsquad: Seperatist forces inside the outpost has been successfully neutralized. Undock from the outpost to complete the mission.
infotext.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostculti: Contact with [location1] was recently lost, and it's suspected that a band of husk cultists has taken over. Locate any infected creatures or cultists inside the outpost and destroy them.
infotext.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostcultist: The infection inside the outpost has been successfully eradicated.
infotext.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostcultist: The infection inside the outpost has been successfully eradicated. Undock from the outpost to complete the mission.
